thread.title: Watch: Elephant knocks on lodge door
thread.title_full: Watch: Elephant knocks on lodge door

author: Megan Ellis
title: Watch: Elephant knocks on lodge door
text:
Watch: Elephant knocks on lodge door Article By: Megan Ellis Tue, 01 Sep 2015 2:26 PM Share Your Email Credit: Kruger National Park/YouTube 
Some lucky visitors to the Baluleni Safari Lodge in the greater Kruger National Park found an elephant knocking on their door. 
A video of the encounter was uploaded to YouTube by Kruger National Park . 
The elephant was part of a herd of five elephant bulls which broke the electric fence around the lodge and stayed within the lodge area for three weeks. 
The elephants broke through to get to the trees as there is an ongoing drought. 
The video starts with the elephant knocking on a sliding door. He is then told off by one of the guests. 
He eventually decides to leave seeing that no one wants to play with him. 
Watch the charming video below: Related Articles
